name: Ninja Dinosaur Showdown?!
description:
Lead a team of elite ninjas against the countless dinosaur horde!

In this RTS/TD, command your ninjas on the battlefield, change their jobs mid-battle, and use awesome ninja powers to devastate your foes. But the ever growing horde will come up with their own abilities to overrun you!

Adventure to new lands, find job-changing items, discover new ninjas, and encounter more devilish dinos!

FEATURES

• Awesome mix of action, real-time strategy, and tower defence
• Dynamic Job System
• 10+ ninja jobs & 10+ dino types
• Meaty campaign with 50+ levels
• 3 difficulties to master
• Unlock over 60+ items
• Intuitive tutorial
• Music by Stephen Froeber

REVIEWS

"Ninja Dino Showdown proves a clear winner for Tower Defence and RTS fans thanks to its active take on the genre.." - iFanzine

"..if you’re a fan of lane defense games, you’ll like Ninja Dino Showdown." - AppAdvice

"So the game is fun and addictive, which is great." - Dallas News

".. the gameplay is turbo addictive, the design works for all ages, and the amount of content (ninjas, abilities, difficulties, etc.) is quite impressive." - yycApps
